ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: BEGGARS (was-Something Awful.com pokes fun at EQ)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks! I m on the 5th one now. I finished the 4th one really easily. A kind necro helped me in exchange for me giving him some pieces of velium. He located
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks! I'm on the 5th one now. I finished the 4th one really easily. A kind
necro helped me in exchange for me giving him some pieces of velium. He
located Tanik for me, and I handed in the thurg gate potion. :-)
I have 75 crystalline threads. I need to start combining them to make fibers
and then combine with teh wurm bile. But my tailoring is only 52. So I need
to work on that first. Anyone know of a quick relatively easy way to go up
in tailoring? I'm having a hard time finding supplies for it.
luv,
-Su

> Congrats on the shawl progress. I just came across those a while back
> in my research for mid-level wish list items. Not ready yet, but I
> think the shawls makes a cool quest series. Lot of work. Good luck on
> the rest of them.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> > I really like to find the lvl 1s who just logged in and don't know
> where
> > their guild is. I will take them to their guild, introduce them to
> their
> > guildmaster and maybe give them some patchwork armor. I have been
> known to
> > give tours of Kelethin to new players or visitors to the area. And
> I'm
> > always more than happy to give peole details to quests so they can
> make xp.
> > :-)
> > Speaking of quests, I just finished my 3rd shawl queast (in Thurg)
> and am
> > starting on the 4th. :-)
> > Gonna go play that now. :-)
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > >
>
>
